DOC.HEADLINE: FROM O.C. AROUND THE WORLD
DOC.TEXT: Pacific Rim and European_nations provided the largest export markets for Orange County products during 1993 . Export destinations , in millions of dollars : Japan : $ 1 # 108 Canada : 865 Mexico : 738 Germany : 455 U.K. : 442 South_Korea : 393 Singapore : 381 Taiwan : 349 Netherlands : 283 France : 266 Hong Kong : 246 Australia : 221 China : 160 Malaysia : 146 Italy : 126 Thailand : 107 Switzerland : 105 Philippines : 94 Brazil : 60 Indonesia : 24 Primary Products Machinery , instruments and electronics had the biggest dollar value of the county ' s exports in 1993 . Types of goods exported , in millions of dollars : Machines : $ 3 # 169 Instruments : 1 # 914 Electronics : 1 # 100 Rubber : 661 Metal : 167 Chemicals : 117 Transportation equipment : 81 Lumber : 67 Food : 63 Textiles : 61 Paper : 31 Stone , clay , glass : 19 Export Growth While the output of Orange County ' s overall economy grew at an average annual rate of 1.8 % from 1988 through 1993 , exports increased by 8.7 % . Percent increase in county exports from previous year : 1988-89 : 13.6 % 1989-90 : 6.0 1990-91 : 6.8 1991-92 : 7.7 1992-93 : 9.5 Source : Vincent Dropsy , Ph.D. , Institute for Economic and Environmental Studies , Cal State Fullerton ; Researched by HOPE HAMASHIGE / For the Times
